title: £20 yoga pants that Amazon shoppers are going crazy for
text:
Yoga pants may be the comfiest item in our wardrobes, but they can be pretty inconvenient. Not only are they often rather unflattering and transparent, but - even more frustrating - it's rare to find a pair with pockets.

But a £20 pair that is currently earning rave reviews on Amazon seem to tick all the right boxes. The IUGA Yoga Pants have been praised not only for being slimming - thanks to their high-rise waistband with tummy control - but also for their hidden pockets which are perfect for carrying your phone, purse or keys.

They're also incredibly comfortable, with reviewers commenting on the softness of the material, the thickness (there's no risk of them becoming see-through), breathability, and the high quality, which is particularly impressive given the very reasonable price tag.

The IUGA Yoga Pants have been praised not only for being slimming - thanks to their high-rise waistband with tummy control - but also for their hidden pockets

The pants have notched up a near-perfect average rating of 4.8 stars out of 5 on Amazon, with more than 1,700 customers sharing their reviews.

One enthusiastic reviewer stated: 'Everything they say about these pants is true! It’s like wearing a second skin, the softest, the comfiest the most practical thing I have ever worn. If I could live in these pants I would.'

Another added: 'These leggings are the best I've ever bought. They are so comfortable, feel really soft and look fantastic. High waisted and support in all the right places.'

Alongside the pants, IUGA sells a range of other yoga products on Amazon including mats, towels, blocks and even yoga shorts, which also feature tummy control and pockets.

The IUGA Yoga Pants pants are incredibly comfortable, with reviewers commenting on the softness of the material, the thickness, breathability, and the high quality

The pants come in a range of colors, including black, light blue, begonia pink, and charcoal. Some shoppers have revealed that they're so impressed with the yoga pants that they have bought several pairs.

'These are fantastic yoga pants and incredibly good value,' one wrote. 'The material is lightweight but thick and not transparent.

'They are soft and comfortable and the pockets are a genius idea.... Much better quality than other more expensive pants I have bought including branded leggings. I've now got several pairs.'
